code: import React,{useState}from"react";import InputEmoji from"react-input-emoji";import uuid from"react-uuid";import MessageItem from"../MessageItem";import"./index.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const userNames=["Alan","Bob","Carol","Dean","Elin"];const Home=()=>{const[text,setText]=useState("");const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const addMessages=e=>{const currentUserName=userNames[Math.floor(Math.random()*4)];setMessages(prev=>[...prev,{message:text,user:currentUserName,id:uuid()}]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"head",children:"React Chat App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"messages-container",children:[messages.map(message=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageItem,{messageObject:message,id:message.id})),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputEmoji,{value:text,onChange:setText,onEnter:addMessages,cleanOnEnter:true,placeholder:"Type a message",keepOpened:true,background:"transparent",borderColor:"black"})]})]});};export default Home;
